name: Sa Mata ni Nelya
description: Sa Mata ni Nelya, (Tagalog for “Through the eyes of Nelya”) is a virtual-reality experience. This single player historical-drama puts the player in the eyes of Nelya, a thirteen year old girl living in Japanese-occupied Philippines during World War II. After her family is killed during the conflict, Nelya struggles to survive alone. She faces the perils of war and the harshness of survival in her homeland while witnessing the horrors and atrocities that have been spawned between the Filipino Resistance and the Japanese forces.
